official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to end tax deferrals on profits accumulated offshore and
			 to terminate the deferral of active income of controlled foreign
			 corporations.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Putting America First Corporate Tax Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Putting America First Corporate Tax Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Inclusion in subpart F income of investments by controlled foreign corporations with respect to
			 members of foreign group which includes United States shareholder

text.#text: For purposes of this section—

header.#text: Foreign group property; expanded affiliated group

term.#tail: means any stock or obligation of any foreign person which is not a controlled foreign corporation.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , as so redesignated, is amended to read as follows:

header.#text: Application of rules for pledges and guarantees

text.#text:
For purposes of subsection (a), a controlled foreign corporation shall, under regulations
			 prescribed by the

an obligation of a United States person if such controlled foreign corporation is a pledgor or
			 guarantor of such obligation, and

an obligation of a foreign person if such controlled foreign corporation or, to the extent provided
			 under such regulations, any United States shareholder of such controlled
			 foreign corporation, is a pledgor or guarantor of such obligation.

text.#text: Notwithstanding

header.#text:
Application of limitation on amount of foreign taxes deemed paid with respect to section 956
			 inclusions

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years of controlled foreign corporations
			 ending after the date of the enactment of this Act and to taxable years of
			 United States shareholders in which or with which such taxable years of
			 controlled foreign corporations end.

header.#text: Termination of deferral of active income of controlled foreign corporations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subsection:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

term.#tail:
means, in the case of any controlled foreign corporation, the income of such corporation derived
			 from any foreign country.

text.#text:
For taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014, notwithstanding any other provision of this
			 subpart, the term

Rules similar to the rules under the last sentence of subsection (a) and subsection (d) shall apply
			 to this subsection.

The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31,
			 2014.
